mapper.insert: insert into item (itemName, price, isSoldOut, itemImg, memberId) values(#{itemName}, #{price}, #{isSoldOut}, #{itemImg}, #{memberId})
mapper.update: update item set itemName=#{itemName}, price=#{price}, itemImg=#{itemImg}, isSoldOut=#{isSoldOut} where itemid=#{itemId}
mapper.select: select isSoldOut from item where itemId=#{itemId}
select count(*) from item where memberId=#{memberId}
select * from item where memberId = #{memberId} limit #{startList}, #{listSize}
select count(*) as listCnt from item where memberId = #{memberId}
